[ 908467 ] Run one test method for junit

My previous fix didn't work correctly.This version should report exceptions thrown while running tests.If an exception is thrown during tearDown() also, the exceptionthrown while running the test will be reported.

Make sure an exception thrown during tearDown() doesn't mask anexception thrown during running the test. I don't much like the TestCase.runBare()code but I can't see how to simplify it. It was so much simpler before. Sniff...
